oldProjects.name: News Mango
oldProjects.description: This is a free news story aggregation site that is mostly focused on financial and science related news stories.

oldProjects.name: Eat da Burger
oldProjects.description: Dynamic todo list style application built on the handlebars templating engine

oldProjects.name: Perfect Match
oldProjects.description: This application is a sample survey that matches users based on a proprietary algorithm that is ultimately based on the user's to the survey's question.

oldProjects.name: Feed Reader

oldProjects.name: Clicky Game
oldProjects.description: This is a memory based card game in which the you attempt to click only unique cards. For a more detailed explanation of the rules please visit the technical documentaion by clicking the link below.

oldProjects.name: Who's that Pokemon
oldProjects.description: In this game the user is presented with a silhoutte of a pokemon and they have a certain number of attempts to guess what pokemon it is letter by letter. This game requires a desktop keyboard to play. For a more detailed explanation of the rules please visit the technical documentaion by clicking the link below.

oldProjects.name: Fast Chat
oldProjects.description: This is a person to person chat application. Create an account and start messaging with other users.
